Developer Terms of Use
des:
To begin, tap the "ENABLE TO USE" button in the Alexa App to connect your Ecoer Home Plus App account and discover your thermostat.

When using the skill, remember to specify the device you wish to control by name. There are two ways to set this up:
*Use the device name you've already set up in the Ecoer Home Plus app.
*Create an Alexa group in the Alexa app, like "Bedroom," and add the device to the group.

Once you know the name or group of your device(s), simply use the following commands with Alexa:
"Alexa, turn (Device Name/Group Name) on."
"Alexa, turn (Device Name/Group Name) off."
"Alexa, set (Device Name/Group Name) mode to Cool/Heat/Auto."
"Alexa, increase (Device Name/Group Name) by _ degrees."
"Alexa, decrease (Device Name/Group Name) by _ degrees."
"Alexa, set (Device Name/Group Name) to _ degrees."
"Alexa, what is the (Device Name/Group Name) set to?"
